website_summaries.verdict: Long-lasting foundation that is ideal for oily skin and helps improve skin tone.
pros: Comes in 39 shades in cool, neutral, and warm shades
Features SPF 15 and has medium coverage with a natural matte finish
Contains salicylic acid to help with oil and doesn't clog pores

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Colorstay Liquid Makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foundation. I have used this foundation since I found it. When I saw it on Amazon at a good price I ordered it from here. My mother even asked what foundation I used as she said it looks so great. It does not clog pores and goes on smoothly. It does not feel thick and stays on all day. It is in between heavy coverage and light coverage and still covers my splotchy complexion. I would recommend this to any age group. I am 58 years old. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: RioRio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It's just as good as high end.. It doesn't break me out, it is full coverage and it keeps my skin matte. I will buy over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skin?!??
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coverage for a drugstore foundation! It looks very natural on the skin when applied with a sponge. I have a lot of acne and redness from picking my skin (yes I know I shouldn't), yet I still get compliments on my "flawless" "China-doll" skin!!!! Definitely a staple in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand and line of Revlon Foundation for over ten years but this item seems to be old, expired or something because no matter how much I shake it up it's not mixing.I have ordered this exact item many times and I have never received a faulty product like this. I am so disappointed. As the pic shows..it's like there is the colour and then a clear liquid and no matter what I do..they wont mix. It cannot be used.
customer_reviews.author: JKA

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great Full coverage foundation. Mocha fits my skin tone perfectly. ALSO GREAT for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: It does not look like I'm wearing makeup
customer_reviews.text: WAY cheaper than the drug store. I'm totally loyal to this product. It does not look like I'm wearing makeup. Pictures so you can see the color on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Nia M.

customer_reviews.title: Sweatproof
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big reviewer, but I had to come review this product. I have very oily skin and this product combined with the colorstay powder keep me matte longer than any other product. I took this photo after a 45 minute spin class and my makeup is still PERFECT (I know it’s bad for my skin, but a girl’s gotta do...). To be fair, I don’t sweat a lot, but I have never been able to leave class without a touch up until now. My sunglasses usually rub off foundation on my nose, but not with this combo.
customer_reviews.author: jenfromks

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Are used to buy Estee Lauder double wear because I like medium to full coverage and I like the longevity of the product. I am now on a budget and it took me weeks to find an equivalent that is much cheaper. Not only is the color spot on, which I have the hardest time finding my match, but it lasts all day. I can wear it with or without a primer, with or without a powder and it is perfect. If you are looking for something that is good quality at a good price, this is it
customer_reviews.author: Brittani M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with a lighter shade, since I always struggle to find one thats just right! I love this foundation, and it has taken the place of my Kat von D lock it foundation (revlon is much more affordable with my college student budget). It covers my acne scars very well (I use a Mary Kay concealer for those extra tough scars) and stays in place all day. It doesn't melt onto my boyfriends white shirts when we cuddle, so it's staying power is A+ in my book. If you look in the bottle it does appear to separate a bit, but I haven't noticed any difference in consistency when I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: FAKE MAKEUP
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this makeup for over 3 years now, so I’m pretty familiar with the texture of it. I opened one of the new bottles I received and when I pumped it onto my finger it was like water. Then, when I put it on my face it was like pure oil with a little color. I was soooo disappointed. Needless to say I am returning and will continue to buy my makeup locally at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark
customer_reviews.text: This foundation was too dark for my skin, contrary to the fact that I buy this in the store and matches my skin. I know it's spring time so maybe I'm lighter and that probably has nothing to do with the foundation but I'm still going to give it 4 stars. Nice, cheap and soon to oxidize, what a life to live!
customer_reviews.author: Sham

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Good but not great. I have combination skin. My t zone gets extremely oily while the rest of my face is normal. I bought this product because the price wasn’t bad and most reviews weren’t either. However, this just isn’t what I’ve been looking for. To me, the coverage is light to maybe, barely medium. It does not ever seem to dry even for being so thin. I definitely want a medium to full coverage foundation. I thought I could possibly build with this foundation and do 2 layers, but that also doesn’t work well. It can get cakes quickly. Again, good for a light coverage. But just not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: josslyn

customer_reviews.title: Definetly Not Medium
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this foundation, is it definitely not medium or as dark as presented in the picture.... this foundation is more of a light ivory, so white! If you have more of a light ivory skin tone, definetly buy it. The foundation texture is soft and pleasant, medium to full coverage in thickness for those above casual days, I love the moisturizing effect of this foundation for dry skin, doesnt feel caky when you put it on, and is overall pleasant smelling, im going to try a darker color and hope for the best, sent this back and got a refund, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic makeup! I don't look like I have on makeup, but I do look like I have absolutely beautiful skin after applying. I am 65 years old and I do not have wrinkles or uneven skin tones. (My mother had good skin, too!) With this makeup, I have flawless looking skin. And, my makeup looks good still when I get home from work 10 hours later. My husband and I can go out to eat and he doesn't have to wait on me to "fix my makeup."
customer_reviews.author: Milo Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than others for problem skin
customer_reviews.text: My face is generally oily and I was looking for a foundation that does not rub off on my phone when I hold it to my cheek, or a tissue when I rub my nose. This rubs off, but only minimally. It’s not as big of a problem for me as with some other products. It has a nice finish on my face. It’s not exactly matte, but with a little powder it sets nicely. I picked a good color and it blends into my complexion well. It has good coverage. I have bought it several times.
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: This foundation sucks (not the seller)
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars strictly for the seller. It was safety sealed, not expired, shipped fast, and was packed safely for transport. That being said.... The actual foundation sucks! This has some coverage but it just sits on top of the skin. You can’t work it in no matter what. Brush, sponge, use less, doesn’t matter. It’s also very dry looking and not long lasting. After 2-3 hrs my oils come through and it starts breaking apart. Doesn’t matter how I prep my skin, no primer, primer, different moisturizer, etc. Its just not for me. I have different drugstore foundations that perform WAY better.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: No! No! No! Broke out my skin and 3 others!
customer_reviews.text: So much grease in this product it will break out your skin! 3 people used it on their face and all broke out! We put it on a girls arm and you could see the irritation from the product! Usually love revlon but not this!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation that stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all different foundations in all price ranges and I keep going back to Revlons Colorstay every time. The foundation is buildable and stays put on my oily skin for hours. Doesn’t cause me to break out or turn orange either. Marked it down one star only because this is a very matte finish and I would love to find a more dewey foundation. Still love it none the less!
customer_reviews.author: SDtropics

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Color Stay Gets FIVE Stars !!
customer_reviews.text: Revlon Color Stay is light but covers like a heavy weight...love it. Stays on all day. Color is true and applies without streaks. A little goes a long way. Switched from Clinique to Revlon over 20 years ago. Have used this product as it progressed thru many improvements over the years and love it. Would chose it over the high dollar products without hesitation. Tip: To remove makeup from hands after applying, use a little Dawn detergent...works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Johns

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage Great color match
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, and was surprised at the quality for the price. In the past, I've purchased foundations ranging from $10-40, but this works as well or better than anything I've used in the recent past. The only complaint I have about the product is that it makes me break out in whiteheads if I wear it for more than a few hours. I have combination skin, however, so that's hard to avoid. If you're on a budget, I definitely recommend this line! The colors are super accurate, it's lightweight and comfortable, and it sets well.
customer_reviews.author: avowen21

customer_reviews.title: 24hr. Stay
customer_reviews.text: I really like best foundation ,I usually use cover girl but wanted to try something new on my face ,I love how it it light weight ,And last on my face ,I don't have to reapply again later it is a 24 hr. Foundation . How ever tho I think I may go up a shader darker ,If you happen to order this make sure you look at the chart of different colors before you buy but I definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Something is terribly wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the past 6 years no problem, suddenly I buy 3 and all came in a clear box. It is watery and weird. definitely a faulty batch. I would stay away for a while from this. 1 star because I have to it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: esjo

customer_reviews.title: Beware....
customer_reviews.text: I have used this foundation for ten years, never had any problems.. until this time. I can not get this to wash off of my face. I ended up in the hospital with a bad infection in my face, and not even the emergency room doctors could get this to wash off of my face. I do not know if the makeup is to blame, but I have never had this problem before now. . I am now on antibiotics every six hours for 20 days. And the foundation looks like it has black oil mixed in with it shade was natural orchid.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssiah

customer_reviews.title: Mixed with moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I found this foundation to be drying for my older skin. I mixed some of it with an equal amount of moisturizer and found that to be much better. This is not a bad thing as this creates twice as much foundation and the bottle will last a long time. If you tend to have oily skin, this might just be perfect as it is. For me, I wouldn't be able to use it without mixing it with moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: SunJoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for me
customer_reviews.text: I vastly prefer the Whipped foundation that Revlon discontinued, but there is no point hoping to find that anymore. So this formulation is the next best thing. The color Warm Golden is perfect for my skin tone. It literally disappears on my face but provides pretty good coverage. With a setting spray it stays on until I take it off. No smearing or separating on the face, no caking or cracking in fine lines. It's good stuff. I can get any foundation I want but I choose this one because of it's color match and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Picky

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived extremely watery and no matter how the mixture is Shaken it doesn't have that thick texture as it should. They probably have an old batch.
customer_reviews.author: Meka

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is very thin and doesn't show up. But very oily and its difficult to come off. Poor poor poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F.

customer_reviews.title: Only foundation I will wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Revlon Colorstay Foundation since I was in high school. I won't say exactly how many years that's been, but trust me, it's been a long time. Lol. I have tried many others, but I always go back because it is a fantastic product. It stays matte and does not make my skin oily. It blends very well, and I compliments all the time. It covers great, but is not heavy. People always expect me to say I am wearing some designer brand makeup, but I gladly tell them that it's very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great make-up for long lasting, full coverage
customer_reviews.text: This make up has the best coverage and lasts so long!!! I use it under my Lancome Dual Finish powder and ALWAYS get rave reviews (and I’m old! 😉). Also the Buff color is always either out of stock, or people use it at the local store (have seen 1/2 empty bottles on store shelves). This is great to buy and have fresh new, unused make-up delivered to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it stays on all day and does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to foundation. I like that it stays on all day and does not wear off on my clothing. I had found another foundation I liked but when I wore my coat and it rubbed against my chin it came off on the coat. This foundation does not do that, it stays put. I also like the choose in colors. I have found one that works for me for winter and another darker color for summer when I have some color on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: sweet pea

customer_reviews.title: All water!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years and decided to purchase from this seller since the price was decent. Bad decision, the product is complete water. I am so disappointment. Do not purchase, appears to be old or not mixed properly before dispensing. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: ChaChaChar

customer_reviews.title: Very runny (not consistency it's supposed to be)
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy mine at Walmart, but they were out of my color. So I bought it on here. The consistency is suppose to be creamy and doesn't slide off your hand when pumped. This product from here was extremely runny and separating horribly and had a funny smell. So I'm assuming it was expired.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Chafardon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first time user or professional!
customer_reviews.text: First time user an I have to say soo awesome I was able to pick the perfect skin tone wich I was very worried I'd pick the wrong shade but it also works so well my dad didn't even notice my make up till I did my eyeshadow haha so very light weight an looks nice n soo easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Stoney

customer_reviews.title: I use true beige and it looks natural to me. Long wearing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation i have worn for years. Never had a problem with it. Long wearning. It easily comes off on clothing or anything you touch with your face but i guess everything is like that. I use true beige and it looks natural to me. Good for correcting uneven skin tone without looking like you are waering a ton of makeup
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great coverup!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new norm for makeup, I highly doubt I will need to look for a different brand. I love it and it offers great all-day coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hager

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Estee Lauder Double Wear!
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a cheaper alternative to the Estee Lauder Double Wear foundation and to be honest this was even better than the Estee Lauder one, I was pretty shocked at how nicely it applies and lasts. I apply it once in the morning and it stays on all day without any re-application needed. Love this product and it's on my order rotation!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite foundation. I have really oily skin (and always ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. I have really oily skin (and always have) plus problems with redness and uneven skin tone because of rosacea and seborrheic dermatitis. This foundation is opaque enough to cover all those problems, without being too heavy, and is oil-free so it does not contribute to the problems mentioned above. I do have to wear powder in addition to the foundation though to help further control the oil, but the powder also helps to set the foundation for the rest of the day. It takes some time to apply the foundation and powder in the morning, but then I'm set for the rest of the day, all the way until bedtime when I wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for makeup!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years -- even when doing acting in commercials - the makeup artists love this product! Great coverage - hides the red color my skin is - gives me an even skin tone. My face is so HAPPY/soothed with this product on -- keeps me from breakouts, too. Lasts all day - and I can wear when swimming, and it stays on nicely! Again, covers imperfections and red very well! I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily acne prone skin and often struggle to get my makeup to last just through an 8 hour work day. This foundation lasts me all day, keeps my skin matte but doesn't look dry and doesn't dry my skin out, and doesn't feel too heavy on the skin. I am really happy with it! The coverage is pretty good too! I would say it gives medium coverage but is buildable. I'm not a full coverage kind of person so that's fine with me. Especially if you use concealer I think you could get full coverage from this foundation. Definitely worth trying it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watery formula.
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely a light weight formula. It just doesn't work for my skin. I have large pores and it sits funny on my skin. Even when applying a sticky primer and a well moisturized face. I use Maybelline Fit Me matte foundation and this doesn't even compare. If you want a badas* drug store formula, try that. I wanted to try this based on reviews but its watery and all in all just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha F.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt make me orange
customer_reviews.text: I always avoided liquid foundation because somehow I always ended up looking orange. I love this because I finally found my shade. I mix my winter shade and the next level of darkness up when I am more tan. Fairly full coverage when applied with a sponge. Very moisturizing. Does rub off easily without setting spray, but it's not typically noticeable anywhere except my fingers (or clothes, upholstery etc. Whatever touches my face). I also barely have to blend at the jawline because the color match is so great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Not the Greatest
customer_reviews.text: I normally use this foundation most days. The formula has changed over the years, and the bottle I received from amazon came in an older packaging, and the texture of the foundation was not the same as the foundation that comes in the newer packaging. The one I received was thinner and oilier and would not stay on my face. The bottle pictured that has black and white on the label is the one I prefer, but I received one with a label that that all white writing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation so much. I have not been blessed with great skin and always have had a difficult time finding foundations that don't look caked on or that actually stay looking nice for more than maybe an hour. This is the first foundation that actually leaves me feeling beautiful until the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy this be sure is your color
customer_reviews.text: I recommend you buy this in a store first, not for first time try...you are not gonna hit the right color, so buy it here when you know which color is your match, like a recurrent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since Highschool (im 25)! Every time i try something new, i hate it and always go back. This is my trusty sidekick. Stays on all night and covers so well! My skin is very sensitive and easily dries out and easily breaks out but i have never had an issue with this! I always recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I really love this foundation!! It's incredibly lightweight and lasts all day. I even went for a walk in the humidity for an hour, and it didn't budge. Like others have said, it's good for light coverage. It has a lovely matte finish and doesn't look cakey. I'm usually pretty good about what shade is best for my skin, but I may need to get a different shade in the future. In the interim, I am pleased with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I found this on Amazon. Such a good price. I will not use any other base on my face. I have tried top brands when I see promotions and sales and always come back to my Revlon Colorstay. Been using it for about 20 years. I'm 60 years old and I constantly get compliments on my skin. I am starting to get some wrinkles under my eyes and this product just masks them. No clumping or ridges. The product somehow blends right in. I work and go to school and the makeup stays fresh all day. I set it with powder and I'm ready for the day. I HIGHLY recommend you try it.
customer_reviews.author: Tica88

customer_reviews.title: People Kept Telling Me About This and I Finally Bought It and....
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact I should have gotten a shade or two darker, I am very happy with this foundation. It does stay on wonderfully all day into the night too. It did not cause any irritation to my skin. It's very easy to blend also. It helps cover my larger pores around my cheekbones and my nose. It's not difficult to wash off with soap and water or whatever you use as your skin cleaning regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Scattered Energy

customer_reviews.title: Natural Tan is the perfect shade to my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I've found the foundation for me. First, I didn't get any pimples. Second, it is very easy to blend to my face. Third, the shade Natural Tan is a perfect match to my skin and it does not oxidize. Fourth, it does not emphasize my dry skin and does not settle in my wrinkles, fine lines, large pores. I really love this! I was hesitant before because some said it oxidized on their faces. But I didn't regret to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Natsume

customer_reviews.title: Bottle/pump defective and exploded product
customer_reviews.text: Bottle/pump was defective and broke off/exploded foundation everywhere in my bathroom (ruining linens etc too) upon opening. Made the product and dispenser/pump completely unusable so I have no clue if it’s even a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Colors to Choose From Plus SPF
customer_reviews.text: I have used Revlon Colorstay products on and off for years. Colorstay offers a large selection of shades plus SPF15. I needed some makeup and was not going to make a long trip to the stores in the next couple of days just for that so I went on-line and found this. It was priced reasonably and had lots of color choices. It does stay on all day!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need
customer_reviews.text: I always get compliments on my skin. People say they can't tell I'm wearing makeup. I actually have blemishes but this product conceals them and most days it is the only makeup I wear. You really can sleep in it and it doesn't even get on the pillow. Thank you Revlon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage. Lasts.
customer_reviews.text: I wear it every day. Great coverage. Lasts a long time. I would recommend going to your drug store and testing for your color tone before ordering online. Get the number of the color that fits your skin so you know that if you decide to order online..that you get thr correct shade. You can buy in thy store but i found it a better price online.
customer_reviews.author: Life Flight Angel

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foundation based off reviews that says it's awesome but not for me. It's an okay foundation, it does cover imperfections and it's easy to spread, but whenever something touches my face part of the foundation goes with it, on my clothes, napkin, everywhere. I use it when I'm going somewhere quick, I wouldn't use it if I had to have it for a long period.
customer_reviews.author: Vivies

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting coverage with SPF 15.
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this brand of foundation for at least the past 15 years. I still love it and I still need the combination and oily skin formula. It covers flaws and under eye dark circles well and gives a nice smooth, matt finish. It is not super heavy and it comes in a ton of colors. Revlon Color Stay makeup is long lasting and still a very good value for for quality of product. I will continue to buy this foundation for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Friskyatsixty

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation I will ever use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this foundation for years. I used to buy at department and drug stores but I get it so much cheaper on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, good coverage, gets oily yet somehow dries out my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over 8 years. Good coverage, my only beef is that a) both the dry skin and combination/oily skin versions really dry out my skin and b) after about 8-10 hours sweat and shine make it melt off your face. It actually is long lasting and you can blot your face and still have some coverage. Very water resistant. I change from a 310 to 315 in the summer and use with covergirl smoothers concealer sticks 710 to 715.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this make up for a few years now and I love it because it lasts on my skin all day! You definitely get your moneys worth and I would recommend this product to anyone! I used to use Clinique but it got way too pricey so i started trying new products and this was 100% the best for me
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Great formula lasts all day and makes my skin look ...
customer_reviews.text: Revlon Color Stay foundation is worth the hype. Great formula lasts all day and makes my skin look flawless! this foundation has a pretty neutral undertone, not too pink or too yellow. This lasts ALL DAY on the very oily skin! highly recommend for anyone with oily skin! they also have a version of this for dry skin that ive heard great things about.
customer_reviews.author: HMH15

customer_reviews.title: Not  authentic ?
customer_reviews.text: The foundation is great but I can NOT put anything on top of it. Any brush I use, barely applying any pressure and it barely touch my face strips the foundation right off. I’m wondering if this is an authentic product because I’ve never experienced this with any foundation before, drugstore or high end. I do my makeup same way everyday and I only have issues with this foundation. I’ve bought it before from the store and this didn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Heighlee

customer_reviews.title: Picture of Cover-up, misleading..old..
customer_reviews.text: My issue with this product is in an old form, it's not knew at all & I can tell by the smell & the look of the bottle, I just wonder how old it is. The pitcher was false leading too, where it comes out, its different & that told me too how old this product is, its misleading. & that's disappointing. I'm just going to buy it at Walmart for now on, not from Amazon, on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nickibabylove71

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and good match to skin color
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many types of foundation and find this to be good coverage, especially during times when I am having trouble with breakouts and skin discoloration. The color matches my skin and it doesn't look like its caked on.
customer_reviews.author: cindy fellows

customer_reviews.title: Can't get a smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: no matter what tool I use for application, I cannot get this makeup to get a smooth finish. I always look cakey and my pores look huge. The foundation is thin and doesn't build well. I wouldn't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: SCnurseMom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Took me so long to find my shade.My closest one was cappuccino but still looked dark and weird on me.Hope ya'll keep the Cinnamon shade around for us who can't use cappuccino. So flawless and stays matte.It has honestly outdone most of my high end foundations.Watched a girl review it on YouTube and she paired it up with her Sephora micro smooth powder which I also used to set.It's like a match made in heaven yaaaas!!!Looks so beautiful on pictures too ooh my.....:)
customer_reviews.author: Njesh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my combo skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I searched for best low priced combination skin foundation and found this so I tried it out. It works awesome. Shade matches my skin perfectly and my skin doesn't look too dry or too oily like most other foundations I've tried. Makes me feel so much better about my skin.
customer_reviews.author: mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this before. It has good color, texture, smooths out well over wrinkles. It works well with oily skin in summer and dry skin in winter time as I have. This has good coverage bu tg not cakey. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: james Byrge

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite foundation and I have a oily facial skin . This product keeps me looking smooth and not dry or pasty looking. No concealer needed for this
customer_reviews.author: At'Tifa M.

customer_reviews.title: 24 Hour Liquid Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great liquid foundation. I hate running out and shopping for one, especially online, but took a risk of guessing on a color and this one seemed to do well. It comes out of the container easily and applies without streaks. It lasts all day too. It is oil-free, fragrance-free and even has a light SPF in it of a 6. Once applied it stayed on my face all day and did not come off with light sweating and did not come off when I changed my clothing. I'll definitely buy the exact same one once this wears out. It is a good color and I like that it lasts all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: deborah d

customer_reviews.title: weighless and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this foundation. It feels weightless yet covers well. It doesn't rub off on tissues or clothes and stays on all day. Gives a nice semi matte finish and smooth appearance. All this for an amazing low price. Also love the pump bottle, no dirty fingers touching the make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foundation that really matches your Skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! For 1 thing the color matches perfectly. For another, the price is unbelievable, I could be wearing crazy expensive foundation for all anyone else knows. It also has a lot of staying power, I can put it on, check hours later & it looks like I just applied it! It feels great on my skin. I will never waste money on cosmetic items again- Get yours now!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Airy and light. Color matches great. Only thing I'd recommend is using a foundation brush in lieu of a beauty blender because it really got soaked up when I attempted to first use the blender more so than my other foundations. Brush did the job much better and looks airbrushed.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Revlon colorstay
customer_reviews.text: I have a purple birthmark above my right eye and the coverage is amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Sun and fun approved
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida. This means a lot of swimming and general perspiration. Not easy to keep makeup on with those odds. I've been an avid consumer of this makeup for years! It was a slight learning curve when I first started using it but worth the effort. One application a day and no matter what I do, no need to reapply. My makeup use to cause a LOT of frustration. Now I don't have to think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Stodgel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This works fairly well but does get a little blotchy by the end of the day, probably because my skin is oily. Would work better for drier skin i think. Does have good full coverage
customer_reviews.author: Cat Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It’s all right
customer_reviews.text: Trying to think about keeping this..doesn’t last all day but matches skin good. Doesn’t cover pores good. Blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love it, left face feeling hydrated
customer_reviews.text: 1st Time wearing liquid foundation and it looks great. Very natural and lightweight. Doesn't feel caked on and doesn't require a lot either. Left my face feeling hydrated after washing it off before I added some lotion
customer_reviews.author: Sirving

customer_reviews.title: Best for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation! I already went through one and buying my second now. If you have oily skin this is perfect! I’ve always struggled to find a foundation that covers my redness and controls my oily skin throughout all day wear. This one is my favorite over any high-end. It’s matte but not drying and it sets like a skin finish.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: All the great reviews are true! This stuff looks great on my 50 year old face. I have oily skin and I didn't have to powder my nose throughout the day as I always have to with other foundations. Great matte finish with medium to full coverage. Love it. Now I'm sure Revlon will discontinue it because I've found a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rotthoff

customer_reviews.title: The Caramel color has a weird red undertone to it ...
customer_reviews.text: The Caramel color has a weird red undertone to it. Surprisingly its also too dark for my skin. After reading several reviews and watched numerous youtube videos, the color was still off. Even after baking and using setting powder it seems kind of dark. I will be exchanging maybe for Golden Caramel.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good *lasting* foundation but not great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: It lasts quite well, transfer proof as long as there is no moisture involved. I used this brand all summer knowing I'd be swimming. This foundation lasted a full day at a waterpark with my face being submerged multiple times. By the end of the day I had only a small area on my nose where the foundation had rubbed off from holding my nose while in water. Only downside in my opinion is that when you do want it off you have to use good soap and at least two cycles of washing your face to get every last bit off. It did dry my face out a bit, but personally I have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Bad package! Open item
customer_reviews.text: It was open when I received, the liquid make everywhere, even get on my blanket, I’m ending up clean my hands and my bed. I should just take some photos!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie white

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It is my perfect color match, blends beautifully with a sponge or brush, looks natural and lasts all day. After 9 hours, almost no blotting needed.
customer_reviews.author: freedom girl

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think it’s authentic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is authentic. This is my go to drugstore foundation in 110 ivory but this one that I ordered on amazon is way darker than the normal 110 shade . It’s way thicker than normal . This is not the formula I am used to at all .
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Super oily and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Color is pretty and fit me well however it is so so so oily that after applying it I feel like washing and scrubbing my face because it’s so heavy and I feel like wearing a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, been using it for years. Has moderate coverage and doesn’t make you feel like you’re wearing a ton of makeup. I don’t have acne anymore but have some scars and redness in my skin and this covers it all!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Medina

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is amazing. I think it's so underrated. The coverage is awesome and seamless and the price is great. Very lightweight and your skin can breathe. It doesn't cake up like some foundations can. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good foundation for the price. It stays pretty dewy and doesn't get dry. My only complaint is the color doesn't always look even to me even though I use the same application process.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bertelsen

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Not a Relvon Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this particular foundation for years. This was my first time buying it online. The foundation looks totally different from any previous bottle I've purchased in the past. The foundation never blends even after being shook and shook and shook and it never mixes. The foundation moves like slime, it never coats the bottle. It's one blob of oil. I was scared to even use it. The product is still in the original package. I won't be putting this product on my face EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Graylon D Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent with others purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and years! Not sure why the same product purchased online is extremely different. It was not as think, color was off and it just rubbed off. That's not how any of the thousands of others I've purchased from the big big stores and corner drug stores. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than CVS!
customer_reviews.text: One of my holy grail foundations! It’s hard to find a good fair, more yellow toned shade, and 150 buff is that for me. I have combination skin and mild acne, and this covers and holds up all day with a satin matte finish. Plus, on amazon it’s several dollars cheaper than the drug store, so give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I ordered this based on the reviews and I must say I won’t rebuy ☹️ I for the most part hve a good skin care Rountine but this just made my face look so dry and gross dry patches 😞
customer_reviews.author: cynthia acosta

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil Free Foundation For Decades
customer_reviews.text: Revlon colorstay has been my foundation for decades. The color is true, does not oxidize, and requires little effort to achieve perfect coverage. I am a customer for life and if you have acne prone skin like myself this is the best choice. No breakouts or heavy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Princess

customer_reviews.title: Best drugstore foundation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Revlon Colorstay for about 5 years now. It is defiantly my go-to foundation. The picture does not show a pump on this container, but my came with the pump. Great improvement!! The only think I don't like about this foundation, is the smell. It has a very strong chemical smell when applying it, but quickly goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Tran

customer_reviews.title: ... bottle I purchased on Amazon recently had either gone bad or Revlon's changed their ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Revlon's ColorStay for a few years now but the bottle I purchased on Amazon recently had either gone bad or Revlon's changed their ingredients. My skin immediately became irritated and felt like it was burning after application, I've tried to use it a few different times but always the same result. Sadly I won't be able to use the full bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Good foundation but product is too light
customer_reviews.text: Good foundation but product is too light. I ordered buff thinking it would be perfect but even with my pale skin, buff is too light. Tip: get at least 1-2 shades darker than what you'd normally get. Otherwise the coverage is nice, it doesn't leave my face streaky like a zebra when blended well.
customer_reviews.author: catdog

customer_reviews.title: Been a Customer of This Product for Many Years! ☺
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a gazillion years and still love the wear it applies, the way it covers and the way it stays on and does not smudge even when it gets wet! Will continue to purchase for lots more years! ☺
customer_reviews.author: Billio

customer_reviews.title: Color is a little naturally pale but really dry
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I expected for something at this price. It makes me a little bit pale but not in a natural way. It could cover most of my skin issues too. The only problem is when I use it in winter, even with really moisturizing cream and primer, it leaves a chalky look, especially around my nose and forehead. I'm usually combinational oily during summer and combinational dry during winter, so maybe it might be more suitable for summer time. But I won't recommend to use it in winter unless you're really really oily and never need to worry about skin flake problem.
customer_reviews.author: firmianarain

customer_reviews.title: Natural
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the Revlon ColorStay liquid foundation I'm glad I went with a color I went with as it's just the perfect shade for me and it looks very natural when I wear it you can put it on without any powder and it dries very nicely and doesn't look too oily it looks natural to as I've said.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for many years for the right foundation, this was the one! I LOVE IT! It goes on smooth, never looks caked on, looks so natural on your face. Will definitely order again when I run out. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Delaware

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have asked this base several times but this time it has come to me very liquid. It seems that it was in more state, it is divided between water and cream, I am not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: HeidyF

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay Liquid Foundation Makeup for Combination/Oily Skin SPF 15, Longwear Medium-Full Coverage with Matte Finish, Almond (355), 1.0 oz
product_meta.description:
Color:355 Almond

The Revlon ColorStay Liquid Makeup for Combination/Oily Skin glides on smooth to deliver long lasting shine control with an even, flawless matte finish to last throughout the day. This oil free, lightweight formula is specifically made for combination or oily skin to control oil absorption and shine. The Revlon ColorStay Liquid Makeup features a pump for mess free application and offers SPF protection. The formula is lightweight and buildable to full coverage. This liquid makeup feels comfortable and wears up to 24 hours with great coverage! Wear it with eyeshadow, eye liner, mascara, and lipstick for a more dramatic look, or keep your routine simple and more natural look by using it alone. Offered in 43 shades ranging in light, medium, and deep. Revlon ColorStay Liquid Makeup for Normal/Dry Skin also available! Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer resistant lipstick and makeup

*Revlon calculation based in part on data reported by Nielsen through its Scantrack Service for the 24HR foundation category for the 52 weeks ending December 29th, 2018 for the Total US market and xAOC channel, according to Revlon’s custom product hierarchy. Copyright 2018, The Nielsen Company.
feature_bullets: Our cult-favorite liquid, matte finish foundation is lightweight and specifically made for combination or oily skin to control oil absorption and shine
The formula is oil-free and fortified with SPF 15, to help protect your skin
Feels comfortable and wears up to 24 hours
Offered in 43 shades ranging in light, medium, and deep
